summary: "The Big Lebowski" is a 1998 comedy film by the Coen brothers. It stars Jeff Bridges as "The Dude," a laid-back bowler mistaken for a millionaire with the same name. The real millionaire asks The Dude to deliver a ransom for his kidnapped wife, but The Dude's friend Walter (John Goodman) plans to keep the money. The film is inspired by Raymond Chandler's stories and features quirky characters, funny dreams, and great music. Though it didn't do well at first, it's now a beloved cult classic and is preserved in the U.S. National Film Registry.
title: The Big Lebowski
